headlines.description: Tottenham breathed life into their top four bid while Leeds' relegation fears deepened after a damaging 4-0 defeat at Elland Road.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs thump Leeds to boost top four bid

headlines.description: Christian Eriksen made his return to competitive action for the first time since collapsing with a cardiac arrest.
headlines.shortLinkText: Eriksen makes first appearance for Brentford

headlines.description: Crystal Palace allowed an early second-half own-goal in a 1-1 draw with Burnley on Saturday in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Own-goal costs Palace in 1-1 draw with Burnley in EPL

headlines.description: Manchester United were left to regret a multitude of missed chances as they were held to a 0-0 draw to Watford in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man United rue missed chances in Watford draw

events.name: Aston Villa at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Aston Villa secured a 2-0 victory over Brighton on Saturday, with Matty Cash and Ollie Watkins on target.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cash, Watkins strike as Villa down toothless Brighton

headlines.description: Manchester City edged to a late 1-0 victory over Everton on Saturday as they continued to set the pace at the top of the Premier League table.
headlines.shortLinkText: Foden strikes late as Man City edge Everton
